import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import rootReducer from"../reducers/reducers";import thunk from"redux-thunk";var store=createStore(rootReducer,window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__&&window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__(),applyMiddleware(thunk)//<-- Sirve para usar las action creators asincrónicas
);export default store;
